body:
Batch operations are fully supported:

✅ Matrix-based parallel execution in workflows
✅ Process multiple operations: update-issues, copilot-tickets, close-duplicates, codeql-alerts
✅ Distributed file processing (.github/issue-updates/*.json)
✅ Legacy file support (issue_updates.json) with grouped operations
✅ Automatic file archiving after processing

Closing as completed.
